CONSOLE ERROR: Refused to display 'http://localhost:8000/security/contentSecurityPolicy/resources/respond-with-multiple-csp-headers.php?csp=img-src%20http://b.com&id=0' because it has not opted-into the following policy required by its embedder: 'img-src http://c.com:* https://b.com'.
CONSOLE ERROR: Refused to display 'http://localhost:8000/security/contentSecurityPolicy/resources/respond-with-multiple-csp-headers.php?csp=img-src%20http://b.com&id=3' because it has not opted-into the following policy required by its embedder: 'img-src http://c.com:* http://b.com/example.com'.
CONSOLE ERROR: Refused to display 'http://localhost:8000/security/contentSecurityPolicy/resources/respond-with-multiple-csp-headers.php?csp=img-src%20http://b.com/example.com&id=6' because it has not opted-into the following policy required by its embedder: 'img-src http://c.com:* https://b.com/example.com'.
CONSOLE ERROR: Refused to display 'http://localhost:8000/security/contentSecurityPolicy/resources/respond-with-multiple-csp-headers.php?csp=img-src%20http://b.com/&id=7' because it has not opted-into the following policy required by its embedder: 'img-src http://b.com/page1.com http://b.com/page2.com http://b.com/page3.com'.
CONSOLE ERROR: Refused to display 'http://localhost:8000/security/contentSecurityPolicy/resources/respond-with-multiple-csp-headers.php?csp=img-src%20http://b.com/page2.com&id=11' because it has not opted-into the following policy required by its embedder: 'img-src http://b.com/page1.com https://b.com/page2.com http://b.com/page3.com'.
CONSOLE ERROR: Refused to display 'http://localhost:8000/security/contentSecurityPolicy/resources/respond-with-multiple-csp-headers.php?csp=img-src%20https://*&id=14' because it has not opted-into the following policy required by its embedder: 'img-src https://b.com'.
CONSOLE ERROR: line 26: Refused to load the image 'http://localhost:8000/security/contentSecurityPolicy/resources/green250x50.png' because it violates the following Content Security Policy directive: "img-src https://b.com".

CONSOLE ERROR: line 26: Refused to load the image 'http://localhost:8000/security/contentSecurityPolicy/resources/green250x50.png' because it violates the following Content Security Policy directive: "img-src https://b.com".

CONSOLE ERROR: line 26: Refused to load the image 'http://localhost:8000/security/contentSecurityPolicy/resources/green250x50.png' because it violates the following Content Security Policy directive: "img-src http://b.com/example.com".

CONSOLE ERROR: line 26: Refused to load the image 'http://localhost:8000/security/contentSecurityPolicy/resources/green250x50.png' because it violates the following Content Security Policy directive: "img-src http://b.com/example.com".

CONSOLE ERROR: line 26: Refused to load the image 'http://localhost:8000/security/contentSecurityPolicy/resources/green250x50.png' because it violates the following Content Security Policy directive: "img-src http://b.com/page2.com http://b.com/page3.com http://b.com/page1.com".

CONSOLE ERROR: line 26: Refused to load the image 'http://localhost:8000/security/contentSecurityPolicy/resources/green250x50.png' because it violates the following Content Security Policy directive: "img-src http://b.com/page2.com".

CONSOLE ERROR: line 26: Refused to load the image 'http://localhost:8000/security/contentSecurityPolicy/resources/green250x50.png' because it violates the following Content Security Policy directive: "img-src https://b.com/page2.com".

CONSOLE ERROR: line 26: Refused to load the image 'http://localhost:8000/security/contentSecurityPolicy/resources/green250x50.png' because it violates the following Content Security Policy directive: "img-src https://b.com/page2.com".

CONSOLE ERROR: line 26: Refused to load the image 'http://localhost:8000/security/contentSecurityPolicy/resources/green250x50.png' because it violates the following Content Security Policy directive: "img-src https://*".

This is a testharness.js-based test.
PASS https is more restrictive than http. 
PASS The reverse allows iframe be to be loaded. 
PASS Matching https protocols. 
PASS Returned CSP has a specific path. 
PASS Returned CSP is more specific. 
PASS Matching paths. 
PASS Matching paths but not protocols. 
PASS Returned CSP is less restrictive in paths. 
PASS All specific paths match except the order. 
PASS Returned CSP allows only one path. 
PASS Returned CSP allows only one path with stricter protocol. 
PASS Returned CSP allows only one path with less stricter protocol. 
PASS Specified protocol should match any domain with that protocol. 
PASS Equal policies with protocols and host wildcards. 
PASS Returned CSP allows any https resources. 
Harness: the test ran to completion.
